predicate.note: Frames file for 'flank' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment.

example.name: the one example
example.text: [*-1] Flanked by flight attendants, pilots and gate agents dressed in spiffy new blue uniforms, they said Eastern has exceeded its operational goals and is filling its seats.
example.arg: flight attendants, pilots and gate agents dressed in spiffy new blue uniforms
